name: Holotape Ghosts
description:
The year is 2287, you are Paladin Devon Michaels of the Brotherhood of Steel. Your protege, former paladin Kent, defected leaving nothing but holotapes and questions along their path. Now that the official investigation is over,  you are granted access to their last remaining documents in the hope of making sense of their disappearance.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

File RN-PH1

File RN-PH2:
